snippet: The chief of the U.N. atomic watchdog said on Monday he was confident following a visit to Washington of "very good cooperation" with the United States on Iran's nuclear deal, despite President Donald Trump's hawkish comments....

headline.main: U.N. Nuclear Chief Says Confident of U.S. Cooperation on Iran Deal
headline.print_headline: U.N. Nuclear Chief Says Confident of U.S. Cooperation on Iran Deal

lead_paragraph: The chief of the U.N. atomic watchdog said on Monday he was confident following a visit to Washington of "very good cooperation" with the United States on Iran's nuclear deal, despite President Donald Trump's hawkish comments.
